ModMetaData.name: Neural Supercharger Ownership Fix (Local)
ModMetaData.author: Segas Wolf
ModMetaData.description:
## Neural Supercharger Ownership Fix
### Problem: - **Register the same load ID twice**: Duplicate load IDs when loading saves with neural superchargers - The mod saves pawn assignments but sometimes registers the same ID twice, causing save/load errors
### Solution: - Prefix patches on PostExposeData methods that deduplicate the lists of assigned pawns/buildings - Removes duplicate entries before they're saved/loaded
### Load Order: Place AFTER the Neural Supercharger Ownership mod in your mod list.
### Patches: - Patch_CompNeuralSuperchargerOwnership_PostExposeData: Deduplicates owned neural superchargers - Patch_CompAssignableToPawn_NeuralSupercharger_PostExposeData: Deduplicates assigned pawns
